price: Tuhan-mu adalah yang melayarkan kapal-kapal di lautan untukmu agar kamu mencari sebagian dari karunia-Nya.  Sesungguhnya Dia adalah Maha Penyayang terhadapmu.
arabic: رَّبُّكُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُزۡجِي لَكُمُ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ لِتَبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِكُمۡ رَحِيمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbukumu alladhī yuz'jī lakumu al-ful'ka fī al-baḥri litabtaghū min faḍlihi innahu kāna bikum raḥīman
